description: From Middle English peesful, pesful, paisful, pesefull, equivalent to peace +‎ -ful.

adjectives.description: peaceful (comparative more peaceful or peacefuller or peacefuler, superlative most peaceful or peacefullest or peacefulest)

entries.meaning: Not at war; not disturbed by strife or turmoil.

description: Derived from the derogatory term religion of peace, which is used against Islam itself for its association with violent attacks by Islam extremists, and alleged support and lack of condemnation against them by certain Muslim communities.

entries.meaning: (India, Islam, Islamophobic, Internet slang, offensive) a Muslim; especially a violent member of a radical Islamist group.
examples: They only have to use a bit of code to name those people; nowadays they call them “peacefuls”. A smirking euphemism is all it takes to sail through Twitter’s filter, and keep the hate-speech flowing.
